content.stimulus_en: (can) ________ you help me with this?
Do you (mind) ________ if I sit here?
(could) ________ you do me a favor?
(would) ________ you like some water?
I (be) ________ very sorry I'm late.
I (apologize) ________ for the mistake.
Would you mind opening the window, please?
I'm sorry very for being late to the meeting.
I apologize for the delay in my response.
Thank very you much for all your help.
Can you do me a favor and carry this bag?
Excuse could me, you tell me what time it is?
The modal or word for Petición/Solicitud is '________'.
Sorry
